sections.heading: property; purchase or receive from government
sections.text: The State of Nebraska, its political subdivisions and instrumentalities, and tax-supported institutions are authorized to purchase or receive surplus property from the government of the United States or any government agency thereof.SourceLaws 1945, c. 2

81-907.Surplus property; purchase or receive from government.

The State of Nebraska, its political subdivisions and instrumentalities, and tax-supported institutions are authorized to purchase or receive surplus property from the government of the United States or any government agency thereof.

SourceLaws 1945, c. 234, ยง 1, p. 693;Laws 1977, LB 548, ยง 5.
